name: Add Subpage Here
author: mitcho (Michael Yoshitaka Erlewine)

sections.description:
This plugin makes it easy for you to add a new subpage to a page you are currently viewing. The plugin adds the following:

  1. a widget which, when enabled, displays a “add subpage” link in your widget areas of pages;
  2. a “Subpage” item to the “Add New” menu on the admin menu bar.

This plugin is a component of the MIT Educational Collaboration Space project.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the add-subpage folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Optionally activate the “add subpage” widget.
sections.changelog:
0.4

  • Remove call-time pass-by-reference, for PHP 5.4 compatibility
  • Now requires WordPress 3.3

0.3

  • Added support for the 3.3 admin bar

0.2

  • Initial public release
  • Added support for the 3.1 admin menu bar

0.1

  • Initial version

short_description: Adds simple widget and admin menu item for adding a subpage to the current page.
